description: Updates the monitoring settings for the cluster. You can use this operation to specify which Apache Kafka metrics you want Amazon MSK to send to Amazon CloudWatch. You can also specify settings for open monitoring with Prometheus.

parameters.name: ClusterArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) that uniquely identifies the cluster.

parameters.name: CurrentVersion
parameters.description: The version of the MSK cluster to update. Cluster versions aren't simple numbers. You can describe an MSK cluster to find its version. When this update operation is successful, it generates a new cluster version.

parameters.name: OpenMonitoring
parameters.description: The settings for open monitoring. Prometheus settings. JmxExporter (dict) --- Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter. Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter. NodeExporter (dict) --- Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter. Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_params.name: JmxExporter
nested_params.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_params.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_params.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the JMX Exporter.

nested_params.name: NodeExporter
nested_params.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

nested_params.name: EnabledInBroker
nested_params.description: Indicates whether you want to turn on or turn off the Node Exporter.

parameters.name: LoggingInfo
parameters.description: LogGroup (string) --- Firehose (dict) --- DeliveryStream (string) --- S3 (dict) --- Bucket (string) --- Prefix (string) ---

nested_items.name: ClusterArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster.

nested_items.name: ClusterOperationArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cluster operation.
